content: single_crochet is made in the bl of the dc3tog fpedc2tog around the fpedc s to the right and left below 14 single_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st double_crochet and pull through a 31 single_crochet 1 fpedc2tog round 38 a chain 1 16 double_crochet the 16th double_crochet is made in the fl of the dc3tog indicated in the 1st photo below fpsc around the fpedc2tog 15 double_crochet don t forget the hidden st indicated in the 2nd photo below x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st double_crochet and pull through b if you do not want to frame your work continue in the next round with a 31 double_crochet 1 fpsc round 39 b work in both loops of the stitches of round 38 chain 1 continue in the next st 255 single_crochet single_crochet in both loops of the st the chain 1 was made in cut yarn and work away yarn ends 32 single_crochet none of my big splashes needed blocking but if yours is a bit wavey i suggest to block your work at this point © big splash by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 23 we have reached the end of this pattern i hope everything was clear and that you enjoyed making your own big splash please tag me as @bokkyshome and use #bigsplash when you share your make on social media to be sure that i get to admire your work a lot of time and effort was put into designing and writing this pattern this pattern is for personal use only finished items may be sold but please be sure to mention @bokkyshome as the designer you are not allowed to share and/or distribute this pattern or any part of it as your own you are not allowed to copy film or use any part of this pattern as your own © big splash by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 24
